Top 25 Places of Special Interest in Groton

Groton Trails Committee turns 25 in 2023. Groton Trails Committee welcomes you to explore 25 special points of interest in the Groton trail system to celebrate its 25th anniversary!

Click/touch on the places below to see its location on our interactive map.
